name: roq/TradingStatus
comment: Enumeration of the tradig status of a symbol

values.name: FastMarket
values.comment: Same as Open, some settings could be relaxed by the exchange

values.name: CloseNotFinal
values.comment: Same as Close, state required to support mid-session PreOpen

values.name: Close
values.comment: No matching, no order actions, good-for-day orders automatically canceled

values.name: PostClose
values.comment: No matching, all order actions (only with next-trading-day validity)
